node.text: Care you to trade?~ I aggress not.~ You peaceful, =player.formalAddressTerm=?~ Wish trade?~ Good scavenge?~ Ah! You seem wanderer. How fare?~ Live and grow, =player.formalAddressTerm=.~ =player.FormalAddressTerm=, I greet in peace.~ Live and drink.~ Ah?~ Greet, =player.formalAddressTerm=.
I am of slynth, a people grown by hydropon.

What see. Leg plant, glow crest.
Grow from sun-crungled hydropon and depart siblings.

Cradle glaze in sun-melt. Plant stuff molded to man-shape.
Within grow slynth. Only slynth, now.

The cracked egg from we crawl yet rest, in the Reef.
Siblings there. One speak very well: Thah.
node.choice: Perhaps I shall visit. Live and drink.
